timeline.bodyText: @ArneDeutsch Do we miss a formatting rule for the hidden tokens clause? The space shouldn't be there, should it?
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: I'm aware that this is a known issue, but it's really sad.
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: @ArneDeutsch Missing formatting rule for actions? The space around the . is unexpected. Same for the space before current
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: @ArneDeutsch Missing formatting rule for EnumLiteralDeclaration - the space around the = is unexpected.
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: Interesting: The return keyword is missing.
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: Blank line? I see that this is part of the original xtext file, but why do we keep that for groups in the formatter?
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: We preserve most newlines because they might be intentionally there. Might be annoying for the user if we remove the newlines inside his rules.
replies.author: ArneDeutsch

timeline.bodyText: @ArneDeutsch Another thing that is missing for hidden clauses: The space before the , is unexpected.
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: @ArneDeutsch  The space before the closing parentheses is unexpected.
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: problem still seems to be there
replies.author: cdietrich
ArneDeutsch

replies.bodyText: I created a ticket for this one: eclipse/xtext-core#1641
replies.author: ArneDeutsch

timeline.bodyText: @ArneDeutsch Also the space after the opening parentheses. Is something missing for unordered groups?
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: problem still seems to be there
replies.author: cdietrich

timeline.bodyText: @ArneDeutsch @cdietrich I'm not sure about that one. For wildcard fragments, I've a slight preference towards a space before the * wildcard. What do you think?
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: Would not agree here ... looks ok for me.
replies.author: ArneDeutsch

timeline.bodyText: There is something missing here: I think it should read RootStatement<Yield> returns Statement:
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: @ArneDeutsch Missing formatting rule for parameterized rule calls? I'd expect a space after the , comma
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: @cdietrich What do you think about the space after the predicates => (..) and -> (..) - I've slight preference towards noSpace for that location.
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: @ArneDeutsch Missing formatting rule for the parameter declarations. There is a space missing after the ,
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: @ArneDeutsch Unexpected spaces around the ! and for the angular brackets. < and >. Please also check the formatting rules for the boolean operators in argument lists. They should be surrounded by a space & and |
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: @ArneDeutsch Missing formatting config for guard conditions?  There are unexpected spaces here inside the < Yield >
timeline.author: szarnekow
szarnekow

replies.bodyText: Ja, in der Tat. Habe es im Unit-Test versucht nachzustellen, da kommt aber raus was man erwarten würde ...
replies.author: ArneDeutsch

replies.bodyText: Ich kann mir nur vorstellen, dass da gerade so die maximale Zeichenanzahl erreicht ist und der automatisch umbricht. Wenn ich die Zeichen zähle komme ich auf 117 ... bissl Whitespace davor ...
replies.author: ArneDeutsch

timeline.bodyText: Still an unexpected space after the assignment op @ArneDeutsch
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: Created a unit test, but there it works as expected ...
replies.author: ArneDeutsch
cdietrich

replies.bodyText: Will be fixed with next commit. Only formatted "=" but missed "+=".
replies.author: ArneDeutsch
